They focus on offering a curated selection of items that enhance everyday living, including furniture, accessories, and beauty products. Their mission is to provide quality and sustainable products that cater to various tastes and needs.
retour: Free shipping on orders over €100 and in-store pickup available.

name: Fonetik - Aalst
about: Fonetik is a lifestyle store that offers a diverse range of interior and lifestyle products. Founded in 2016, it aims to connect people through unique items that tell a story. The store emphasizes transparency, authenticity, and sustainability, providing everything from furniture and home accessories to jewelry and skincare products. In 2025, Fonetik expanded to a second location in the same street, which serves as a space for personalized interior advice and community events.
